Screenwriter: Kongdej Jaturanrasamee, Waratthana Weerayawattana, Piyaros Thongdee, Joe Wannapin
Production Co: Sahamongkolfilm Co. Ltd., Baa-Ram-Ewe, TF1 International
Synopsis: A young fighter (Tony Jaa) travels to Australia to retrieve stolen elephants that were promised originally to the king of Thailand. Once there, he enlists the aid of a Thai-born Aussie detective to help him achieve his goal, and he uses his fierce Muay Thai moves to battle an evil woman's gang of deadly bodyguards.
Title: The Protector
